headers.mt: The Book of the Prophet Isaiah

15: Man is brought down, and the great man is humbled, and the eyes of the lofty are cast down.
16: Yahweh of hosts is exalted in his justice, and God the Holy One shows himself holy by his righteousness.
17: Then the sheep will feed as in their own pasture, and in the ruins, lambs will graze as foreigners.

17.content: + \ft Some modern versions have \fqa and in the ruins of the rich, lambs will graze \fqb .
